name: The Fox and the Coconut
description:
A thirsty fox in the desert yearns for the coconuts floating on balloons, but the only things to use to pop them are cactuses!

Controls (Keyboard):

A - Move left

B - Move right

Space - Jump

Q - Pick up cactus

P - Pause or Start/Enter

Controls (Gamepad):

Left Stick - Move

A - Jump

X or B - Pick up cactus

Start - Pause or Start/Enter
